languages.text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.
languages.original_text: Вы можете заслужить доверие торговцев Простора Коронус, поставляя им собранные в ваших путешествиях грузы. Это позволит улучшить вашу репутацию и расширить выбор товаров.

traits.locale_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.
You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.
You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

languages.text: Вы можете заслужить доверие торговцев Простора Коронус, поставляя им собранные в ваших путешествиях грузы. Это позволит улучшить вашу репутацию и расширить выбор товаров.
Puedes ganarte la confianza de los vendedores de la Extensión de Koronus proporcionándoles el cargamento que encuentras en tus viajes. Eso mejorará tu reputación y aumentará la oferta del vendedor.
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

traits.locale_text: Puedes ganarte la confianza de los vendedores de la Extensión de Koronus proporcionándoles el cargamento que encuentras en tus viajes. Eso mejorará tu reputación y aumentará la oferta del vendedor.

languages.text: 您可以向科罗努斯扩区的商贩售卖您在探险之旅中发现的货物，从而赢得他们的信任。这可以提高您的声誉，扩大商贩的库存。
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

traits.locale_text: 您可以向科罗努斯扩区的商贩售卖您在探险之旅中发现的货物，从而赢得他们的信任。这可以提高您的声誉，扩大商贩的库存。

languages.text: 旅先で見つけた貨物を提供することで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの商人たちから信頼を得ることができる。そうすることで、あなたの評判が上がり、商人の在庫が増えていくのだ。
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

traits.locale_text: 旅先で見つけた貨物を提供することで、コロヌス・エクスパンスの商人たちから信頼を得ることができる。そうすることで、あなたの評判が上がり、商人の在庫が増えていくのだ。

languages.text: Du kannst das Vertrauen von Händlern in der Koronus-Ausdehnung gewinnen, indem du ihnen Waren lieferst, die du auf deinen Reisen findest. Das steigert dein Ansehen und erweitert das Angebot der Händler.
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

traits.locale_text: Du kannst das Vertrauen von Händlern in der Koronus-Ausdehnung gewinnen, indem du ihnen Waren lieferst, die du auf deinen Reisen findest. Das steigert dein Ansehen und erweitert das Angebot der Händler.

languages.text: Pour gagner la confiance des vendeurs des Étendues de Koronus, vous pouvez leur fournir des marchandises glanées au cours de vos voyages. Cela vous permettra d'améliorer votre réputation et d'alimenter les stocks des vendeurs.
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.

traits.locale_text: Pour gagner la confiance des vendeurs des Étendues de Koronus, vous pouvez leur fournir des marchandises glanées au cours de vos voyages. Cela vous permettra d'améliorer votre réputation et d'alimenter les stocks des vendeurs.

languages.text: Yolculukların esnasında bulduğun kargoları Koronus Enginliği'ndeki tüccarlara vererek onların güvenini kazanabilirsin. Böylece hem itibarın artar hem de tüccarın stokları genişleyip çeşitlenir.
languages.original_text: You can gain the trust of vendors in the Koronus Expanse by providing them with cargo you find on your journeys. This will increase your reputation and expand vendor's stocks.
